description: The Armonía Ambiental initiative, based in Providencia de Dota, began in the early 2000s with support from the Spanish government. It focuses on sustainable tourism and agricultural practices, emphasizing community involvement and environmental harmony. The project aims to provide visitors with authentic experiences of Costa Rican rural life while promoting healthy living through organic food production. By fostering local collaborations and sharing knowledge, it seeks to inspire others and create a positive impact on both the community and the environment.
name: Armonía Ambiental
